Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.tui.rendering.draw

Class Line

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.tui.rendering.draw.Line
public class Line extends Object
A utility class to draw lines on a DrawArea.

  • Method Details

    • right

      public static void right(DrawArea a, Position p, int len, char c)
      Draws a horizontal line of length len starting from position p and going to the right. The line is drawn with character c.
      Parameters:
      a - the DrawArea to draw on
      p - the starting position
      len - the length of the line
      c - the character to draw

    • right

      public static void right(DrawArea a, int x, int y, int len, char c)
      Draws a horizontal line of length len starting from position x, y and going to the right. The line is drawn with character c.
      Parameters:
      a - the DrawArea to draw on
      x - the x coordinate of the starting position
      y - the y coordinate of the starting position
      len - the length of the line
      c - the character to draw

    • down

      public static void down(DrawArea a, Position p, int len, char c)
      Draws a vertical line of length len starting from position p and going down. The line is drawn with character c.
      Parameters:
      a - the DrawArea to draw on
      p - the starting position
      len - the length of the line
      c - the character to draw

    • down

      public static void down(DrawArea a, int x, int y, int len, char c)
      Draws a vertical line of length len starting from position x, y and going down. The line is drawn with character c.
      Parameters:
      a - the DrawArea to draw on
      x - the x coordinate of the starting position
      y - the y coordinate of the starting position
      len - the length of the line
      c - the character to draw

    • rectangle

      public static void rectangle(DrawArea a, Position tl, Dimensions dim, Line.Style style)
      Draws a rectangle with the top-left corner at tl and the given dimensions.
      Parameters:
      a - the DrawArea to draw on
      tl - the top-left corner of the rectangle
      dim - the dimensions of the rectangle
      style - the style to use for the lines
